name: super-luck
effect: This Pokémon's moves have critical hit rates one stage higher than normal.
short_effect: Raises moves' critical hit rates one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
